OrgName.entry: PENISTONE FOOTPATH RUNNERS AND ATHLETICS CLUB

Desc.entry: Athletics club for track events, road running, cross country and fell running for adults and children aged 8 years and over. Holds the Hartcliffe Hill Race in April, Thurlstone Chase in July, the Penistone Show 10k road race and Oxspring Trail Race in September. Also helps to organise the Trunce Race every 3 weeks throughout the summer , the Broomhead Chase in July and the Hunshelf Amble in June.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Tues & Thurs at 6.30pm (seniors), Tues & Fri at 6.30pm (juniors)
